traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The reverser has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The reverser makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. 11 (1d12 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12 damage) force damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) force damage.
